tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE asset_metadata (
    asset_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    asset_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    last_modified TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    version INT NOT NULL,
    author VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE asset_metadata (
    asset_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(255),
    asset_type VARCHAR(50),
    asset_description TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE version_control (
    version_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_id UUID REFERENCES asset_metadata(asset_id),
    version_number INT,
    version_notes TEXT,
    version_creator VARCHAR(100),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE assets (
    asset_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(255),
    asset_type VARCHAR(50),
    asset_size INT,
    created_date TIMESTAMP,
    modified_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE versions (
    version_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_id UUID,
    version_number INT,
    version_date TIMESTAMP,
    version_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES assets(asset_id)
);

CREATE TABLE projects (
    project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    project_description TEXT,
    project_manager VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE asset_versions (
    version_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_id INT,
    version_number INT,
    version_description TEXT,
    created_on TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES asset_metadata(asset_id)
);

CREATE TABLE project_assets (
    project_id INT,
    asset_id INT,
    version_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (project_id, asset_id, version_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES project_metadata(project_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES asset_metadata(asset_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (version_id) REFERENCES asset_versions(version_id)
);

CREATE TABLE assets (
  asset_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  asset_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  asset_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  asset_size INT NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE versions (
  version_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  asset_id UUID REFERENCES assets(asset_id),
  version_number INT NOT NULL,
  version_description TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
